intension: Design a mockup for a startup app that showcases its various use cases and why users should try it. Display the time of 16:21 to show the app is up to date and reliable.
globalcaption: The image features a person holding a cell phone in their hand, displaying the time of 16:21. The phone is positioned in the center of the scene, with the person's hand visible on the right side of the image. The background is a green color, and the time is displayed prominently on the screen.
keywords: app, application, screen, phone, mobile, smartphone, startup, it, technology, green, hand, clock, time, instagram, post, insta, ig, mockup

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a person holding a cell phone in their hand. The cell phone is displaying the time of 12:21. The background is a bright green color, which contrasts with the cell phone and the person's hand
